title: Mathematics Pedagogy Enhancement Course Utilizing Simulation Games

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics education theories and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to develop mathematics teaching competencies via simulation games in limited technological environments (primarily smartphone-based). Emphasizing problem-solving skills through real-time feedback

learning_goals: Learners can recreate mathematical problem situations three or more times using simulation games
Learners can correct 80% or more of in-game errors through a real-time feedback system
Learners can analyze simulation results and propose two or more instructional strategies applicable to actual classroom instruction
Learners can derive three improvement points for simulation-based lesson design through peer assessment

resources: LMS (Learning Management System) Integrated Feedback Tool
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
